name: Super Bear: Hunt for the lost beer
name_original: Super Bear: Hunt for the lost beer
description:
Story:

Super Bear: Hunt for the lost beer is action packed Top down melee rpg game with several different enemies.
Big enemy spider and his army which contains: warriors, orcs and mini spiders have robbed Super Bear Beer bottles and now Super Bear is very angry. Beat enemies and end of every level is Spider boss, which need to be killed so then gate will removed and beer bottles can be saved. There are 10 different themed levels and end of every level spider boss. Also there are bonus level, ultimate wave arena, that level has 6 waves of enemies and all need to be destroyed.
Player have different weapons and super attacks. Also player can use medkits to restore health. So be brave Super Bear and save Beer bottles

Features:

- 10 levels
- Arena wave level, where is 6 waves enemies, which need to be defeated to finish wave level
- Different enemies: Warrior with sword, Orcs with melee weapons, mini spiders
- Big Spider boss which need to be defeated to remove gate and save beer bottles
- Steam achievements
- Medkits
- Different sword weapons
